revisionDesc.change: Pull translation out of APIS record.

div.ab: lines 9ff. ;The 21st year of Antoninus Caesar the lord, Apyni 27. Through Horion the collector Sabinos, son of Menas (paid) from the rent of sheep of the estate formelry belonging to Maecenas for the past 20th year twelve drachmas, total 12 dr. likewise sixteen, tot. 16 dr. likewise sixteen, tot. 16 dr., 17 ob.;the 22nd year of Antoninus Caesar the lord, Hathyr 10. Through Horion the collector Sabinus, son of Menas, (paid) from the rent of sheep of the estate formerly belonging to Maecenas for the past 21st year eight, tot. 8 dr., likewise four, tot. 4 dr., likewise eight, tot. 8 dr., likewise sixteen, tot. 16 dr., likewise eight, tot. 8 dr.;(2nd hand) the first year of Antoninus and Verus the lords Augusti, Payni 17. Paid through Harsythmis and the rest of the shepherds of the village of Euhemeria Sabinus, son of Menas, from the rent of sheep of the estate formerly belonging to MAecanas eight drachmas, tot. 8 dr., 2nd year, Tybi 1, sixteen drachmas, tot. 16 dr., (on the) 25th eight drachmas, tot. 8 dr. Mecheir 19 eight drachmas, tot. 8 dr., Pharmouthi four drachmas, seventeen obols, tot. 4 dr. 17 obl.;Verso (1st hand) payment for pastures for the 21st year of Antoninus Caesar the lord. Sabinus, son of Menas, pays four, tot. 4 dr.

listBibl.bibl: Wallace Sh. Leroy , JEA 25, 63-, 1939 -- VI 8972 Sijpesteijn PJ , P.Wisc. II, 83, 1977, Plate XXXVIII -- BL Corcondance, 269, (line 17)
